commit.message:
Revert one ipa_call_summaries::get to get_create (PR ipa/86323).

2018-07-02  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

        PR ipa/86323
	* ipa-inline.c (early_inliner): Revert wrongly added ::get call.
2018-07-02  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

        PR ipa/86323
	* g++.dg/ipa/pr86323.C: New test.

From-SVN: r262297
